00051 #ifndef ENDIAN_H
00052 #define ENDIAN_H
00053 
00054 #include "thread.h"
00055 
00056 /* data swapping functions, from big/little to little/big endian format */
00057 #define SWAP_WORD(X)                                                    \
00058   (((((word_t)(X)) & 0xff) << 8) | ((((word_t)(X)) & 0xff00) >> 8))
00059 #define SWAP_DWORD(X)   (((dword_t)(X) << 24) |                         \
00060                          (((dword_t)(X) << 8)  & 0x00ff0000) |          \
00061                          (((dword_t)(X) >> 8)  & 0x0000ff00) |          \
00062                          (((dword_t)(X) >> 24) & 0x000000ff))
00063 #define SWAP_QWORD(X)   (((qword_t)(X) << 56) |                         \
00064                          (((qword_t)(X) << 40) & ULL(0x00ff000000000000)) |\
00065                          (((qword_t)(X) << 24) & ULL(0x0000ff0000000000)) |\
00066                          (((qword_t)(X) << 8)  & ULL(0x000000ff00000000)) |\
00067                          (((qword_t)(X) >> 8)  & ULL(0x00000000ff000000)) |\
00068                          (((qword_t)(X) >> 24) & ULL(0x0000000000ff0000)) |\
00069                          (((qword_t)(X) >> 40) & ULL(0x000000000000ff00)) |\
00070                          (((qword_t)(X) >> 56) & ULL(0x00000000000000ff)))
00071 
00072 /* recognized endian formats */
00073 enum endian_t { endian_big, endian_little, endian_unknown};
00074 /* probe host (simulator) byte endian format */
00075 enum endian_t
00076 endian_host_byte_order(void);
00077 
00078 /* probe host (simulator) double word endian format */
00079 enum endian_t
00080 endian_host_word_order(void);
00081 
00082 #ifndef HOST_ONLY
00083 
00084 /* probe target (simulated program) byte endian format, only
00085    valid after program has been loaded */
00086 enum endian_t
00087 endian_target_byte_order(struct thread_t * core);
00088 
00089 /* probe target (simulated program) double word endian format,
00090    only valid after program has been loaded */
00091 enum endian_t
00092 endian_target_word_order(struct thread_t * core);
00093 
00094 #endif /* HOST_ONLY */
00095 
00096 #endif /* ENDIAN_H */
